name.value: FHIR Connectathon 22 - Terminology Services - Translate - OK - POST - Coding - JSON

description.value: ConceptMap $translate tests against known FHIR code systems where the expected outcome is a successful response with a matched code value from the target system. All $translate operations are performed using the FHIR Operation Framework HTTP POST method with Parameters of coding, source and target.

ConceptMap $translate operation test using HTTP POST with coding, source and target parameters; http://hl7.org/fhir/address-use|home, target http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-AddressUse. Expected response is 200 (OK) with a Parameters payload containing the matched target system code.
Test ConceptMap $translate operation for http://hl7.org/fhir/address-use|home, target http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-AddressUse.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the returned format is JSON.
Confirm that the returned resource type is Parameters.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource type conforms the base FHIR specification.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource contains the expected parameter result with boolean value equal to true.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource contains the expected parameter match with part concept and valueCoding.code equal to 'H'.

ConceptMap $translate operation test using HTTP POST with coding, source and target parameters; http://hl7.org/fhir/address-use|old, target http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-AddressUse. Expected response is 200 (OK) with a Parameters payload containing the matched target system code.
Test ConceptMap $translate operation for http://hl7.org/fhir/address-use|old, target http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-AddressUse.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the returned format is JSON.
Confirm that the returned resource type is Parameters.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource type conforms the base FHIR specification.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource contains the expected parameter result with boolean value equal to true.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource contains the expected parameter match with part concept and valueCoding.code equal to 'BAD'.
